information.North: You are at the West Fourth Street Station lobby area. This station has uptown and downtown A, B, C, D, E, F and M trains. The turnstiles are in front of you. The ticket vending machine is to the left of the turnstiles.
information.South: You are at the West Fourth Street Station lobby area. This station has uptown and downtown A, B, C, D, E, F and M trains. The turnstiles are behind you. The ticket vending machine is to the left of the turnstiles.
information.East: You are at the West Fourth Street Station lobby area. This station has uptown and downtown A, B, C, D, E, F and M trains. The turnstiles are to your left. The ticket vending machine is to the left of the turnstiles.
information.West: You are at the West Fourth Street Station lobby area. This station has uptown and downtown A, B, C, D, E, F and M trains. The turnstiles are to your right. The ticket vending machine is to the left of the turnstiles.
information.Unknown: You are at the West Fourth Street Station lobby area. This station has uptown and downtown A, B, C, D, E, F and M trains.

information.North: You are on the A, C, E, Uptown trains platform. The A train will arrive on the right platform. The C and E trains will arrive on the left platform.
information.South: You are on the A, C, E, Uptown trains platform. The A train will arrive on the left platform. The C and E trains will arrive on the right platform.
information.East: You are on the A, C, E, Uptown trains platform. The A train will arrive in front of you. The C and E trains will arrive behind you.
information.West: You are on the A, C, E, Uptown trains platform. The A train will arrive behind you. The C and E trains will arrive on in front of you.
information.Unknown: You are on the A, C, E, Uptown trains platform.

information.North: You are on Mezzanine level. The A, C and E trains platforms are one level up. The D, E, F and M trains platforms is one level down.
information.South: You are on Mezzanine level. The A, C and E trains platforms are one level up. The D, E, F and M trains platforms is one level down.
information.East: You are on Mezzanine level. The A, C and E trains platforms are one level up. The D, E, F and M trains platforms is one level down.
information.West: You are on Mezzanine level. The A, C and E trains platforms are one level up. The D, E, F and M trains platforms is one level down.
information.Unknown: You are on Mezzanine level. The A, C and E trains platforms are one level up. The D, E, F and M trains platforms is one level down.

information.North: You are on the Uptown B, D, F and M trains platform. The F and M trains will arrive on the right platform. The B and D trains will arrive on the left platform.
information.South: You are on the Uptown B, D, F and M trains platform. The F and M trains will arrive on the left platform. The B and D trains will arrive on the right platform.
information.East: You are on the Uptown B, D, F and M trains platform. The F and M trains will arrive in front of you. The B and D trains will arrive behind you.
information.West: You are on the Uptown B, D, F and M trains platforms. The F and M trains will arrive behind you. The B and D trains will arrive in front of you.
information.Unknown: You are on the Uptown B, D, F and M trains platform.

completeInformation: Step1. Cross the turnstiles. Turn right for uptown trains. Walk five steps and turn left. Continue walking on the long corridor till you reach the Uptown A, C, E trains platform.

Step 2. Once you reach the Uptown A, C, E platform, keep walking straight till you reach the staircase in front of you at about 20 steps. Take the staircase down to the Mezzanine level. The Uptown F train platform is one level down the Mezzanine level.
Step 3. Walk straight about 8 steps from the staircase you climbed down till you reach the next staircase. Climb down the stairs to take you to the Uptown F train platform.
Step 4. Once you have reached the Uptown F train platform. The F train will arrive on your right hand side.

Step 1. Your are on the Uptown A, C, E platform. There are three staircases on this platform that lead to the Mezzanine level. Take any one staircase to reach the Mezzanine level. The Uptown F train platform is one level down the Mezzanine level.
Step 2. Once you are on the Mezzanine level, walk straight about 8 steps from the staircase you climbed down till you reach the next staircase.
Step 3. Climb down the stairs to take you to the Uptown F train platform.
Step 4. Once you are on the Uptown F Train platform, use voice command Location Information to find out which side the train arrives.
Step 1. You are on the Mezzanine level. The Uptown F train platform is one level down the Mezzanine level. There are five staircases that lead down to the Uptown F trains platform
Step 2. Climb down the stairs to take you to the Uptown F train platform.
Step 3. Once you are on the Uptown F Train platform, use voice command Location Information to find out which side the train arrives.
You are on the Uptown F Train Platform
